Thats the chat log which apparently got me banned, I was joking around about my Chinese nationality when other players told me to speak english after the first line when I helped stop a shaco invading lees red.
Than I got angry when lee was afking from the game after lee had already raged at everyone in the team.
How exactly does this game constitute a ban which I've never had before?
Is joking about your nationality something that gets banned now? Is asking to ff after we're down a gazzilion kills something to get banned for now?
Please explain exactly what aspect was ban worthy because as far as I can see this is literal racism as joking about your nationality is ban worthy now or getting angry at people afk is worth banning now.

Edit: %%%%%%%%%%% is apparently blocked here so I added spaces to show it.

replies.body: I just reported that post, so uncool dude.

Unfortunately the bot can't determine context.

As another aside, you would have had more then 1 game worth of logs, so it's still possible your hiding your actual toxicity.

All that said, if you legitimately believe that the bot has flagged you unfairly and this is legitimately the only game where you could have been deemed toxic, send a thing into Rito Support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ) and try to appeal it.
